bugs.title: CVE-2021-44647 lua: type confusion in funcnamefromcode in ldebug.c could result in local DoS

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-44647 lua: type confusion in funcnamefromcode in ldebug.c could result in local DoS

long_desc.thetext:
Lua 5.4.4 and 5.4.2 are affected by SEGV by type confusion in funcnamefromcode function in ldebug.c which can cause a local denial of service.

References:

http://lua-users.org/lists/lua-l/2021-11/msg00204.html
http://lua-users.org/lists/lua-l/2021-11/msg00195.html

Created lua tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2044416]
Marked all /services "notaffected." No 5.4.x versions of Lua found in service manifests.

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2021-44647

bugs.title: CVE-2021-43519 lua: stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c allows a DoS via a crafted script file

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-43519 lua: stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c allows a DoS via a crafted script file

long_desc.thetext:
Stack overflow in lua_resume of ldo.c in Lua Interpreter allows attackers to perform a Denial of Service via a crafted script file.

Reference:

http://lua-users.org/lists/lua-l/2021-11/msg00015.html
http://lua-users.org/lists/lua-l/2021-10/msg00123.html

Created lua tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2047673]

This issue has been addressed in the following products:

  Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9

Via RHSA-2023:0957 https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2023:0957

This issue has been addressed in the following products:

  Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.0 Extended Update Support

Via RHSA-2023:1211 https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2023:1211

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2021-43519

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by spot.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'waiting'.
This update has obsoleted [lua-5.4.3-4.fc34](https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2022-2786a8de85), and has inherited its bugs and notes.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'passed'.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has been submitted for stable by bodhi.
This update has been pushed to stable.

notes:
Update to lua 5.4.4, 5.3.6. Note that while this fixes CVE-2021-43519, it was also fixed in 5.4.3-4.

----

Fix CVE-2021-44647 (and other known upstream bugs)
title: lua-5.4.4-1.fc34
